title: Stunning 3bedroom Apartment!!! BRAND NEW!!
posting_body: ['**Lovely Modern 3 Bedroom, 1 Bath Home near Auburn Gresham!', 'Newly Remodeled, Brand New Appliances, and Located on a Quiet Friendly Block!', 'This is a lovely brand new apartment.', 'All appliances are brand new, and the unit has never been occupied!', 'Located on a nice quiet block, walking distance from the Metra, Red Line, and CTA 87th Street bus stop.', 'Near all major store locations:', "WalMart, Lowe's, Food4Less, Starbucks, Dunkin, and etc! Has been approved for Section 8 voucher.", 'Rent approved for $1430monthly.', 'There is a required move-in fee of $1500.', 'Background checks are ran on anyone over the age of 16 who will live in the property.']
